title: DDFP 414: Week 15 Review & All Santa Team
itunes:title: DDFP 414: Week 15 Review & All Santa Team
description:
Shek sits down with NFL Media's Maurice Jones-Drew and Patrick Claybon to review Week 15. The guys talk about Odell Beckham Jr. and Josh Norman's performances, as well as who is to blame for their on field drama. Shek and MJD give their final four predictions, one of which doesn't include the Carolina Panthers. Lastly, Shek releases the starters for his "All Santa Team". All this and more on DDFP.  Watch the full show at: https://youtu.be/tRzcHfuVyPc

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
